OOC: Preston, I have one word to say about the write up.. Coooooool.

BIC:
=

As the fortress gets erected, Night Shift feels the vibrations of the mech=
anical drive system that brings it to the surface, as he sees a control pan=
nel shot out by Darkhawk, AKA Windlord.  It was exactly what he had hoped f=
or.  Even though he takes a few shots to his hatch back as consequence to h=
is actions.  He makes no complaints.  Then he suddenly senses for a brief m=
oment, a trace of a Maximal signature.  He ID's it, and comes up with Windl=
ord.

" Hello, looks like I just found one of our boys.. Hmm, shell program=
, just like Rodimus..  Anyway, I got bigger fish ta fry, so looks like I be=
tter go lights out completely."

He turns off his headlights and resorts to=
 night vision.  He could not turn off his Autobot signature but he could st=
ill give Scorponok a hard time.  All he had to do was transform, so is not =
to make noise.  From the sound of spinning tires, to nothing at all, he tra=
nsforms, and leaps up into the fortress rafters, and like a ghost, vanishes=
.  Ninjabots were good at it, he especially. First things first, he had to =
think about his next move.  He scans the floor with his night vision and th=
en up where he is. He finds another power box.

" I wonder what this one co=
ntrols..."

He inches closser to it, and strikes the box with a short riffl=
e blast.  He didn't know what to expect but it was worth a shot in the dark=
 literally.

Outside the fortress, Quickstride and Rat Trap remain outside =
as told, as Tucson Prime approaches the entrance of the fortress, and with =
very strong arms, due to his all wheel drive system, he pries them open usi=
ng nothing but brute strength.  He leaves just enough room for him to enter=
 the fortress, and recloses them as he gets in.  He didn't care if he was d=
iscovered, this was it, he was going to make Hydras, Cyclonus, and Scourge =
pay for what was done to his comrades.  

" Fun's over Hydras.."

He implem=
ents his sonar emitter, and sends a highly painful disrupter wave throughou=
t the fortress, which only harms Predacon and Decepticon programming. The d=
isrupter causes massive vibration throughout the fortress.  Nightshift feel=
s it beneath his feet, as he remains up on the rafters.  He then catches hi=
s comrade's signature.

He jumps down from the rafters and calmly stops his=
 speeding around, leaning casually up against a wall, with arms folded into=
 his chest.
He knew who was causing the vibrations and it was only a matter=
 of time before everyone felt the fury of Tucson Prime.

" Ohh I know where=
 this is commn' from.  You Predapunks are in trouble now.  Biiiiiig trouble=
.  I'm talkn' the type of trouble that's gonna have all of ya slagged in a =
matter of minutes."

Then, the sound of metal groaning fills the room, as T=
ucson Prime's fingers manage to pry open the doors with a horrible screech.=
  He opens them just enough to gain access into the room, and then lets the=
m close.  He turns on his high beams on his headlights, filling the room wi=
th light.  Nightshift gives a sly grin, and a chuckle while rubbing his han=
ds together.

" Slaaaaaaag, you boys is in trouble now."

Tucson Prime nodd=
s.

" I've come only to take back what has been taken from the Autobots.  o=
ur comrades, and our leader.  I have also come to redeem justice for my fel=
low Autobots and Maximals.  Serious crimes have been committed here, and wo=
rst of all, against Primus himself. No one betrays Primus.  And for that be=
trayal, there will be punnishment.  But not the type that you seem to enjoy=
, no, as Autobots we don't work that way.  What fate has deemed right for y=
ou, that is what will be served.  And to those you have wronfully transform=
ed into your personal puppets, I will bright them to the light they despera=
tely need to escape your tyrany."

He delves deep into his spiritual senses=
, becomming one with the power within him.  The emblem on his chest, lumina=
tes with a blinding light, which can only be produced by the power of the M=
atrix of Leadership.  He goes quiet for just a moment.  Then, he opens his =
eyes and stands tall and solid.

"LIGHT OUR DARKEST HOUR!"

A powerful beam=
 of light bursts free from the luminated Autobot insginia and first heads t=
oward Darkhawk, bouncing off Scorponok and Scourge on the way toward him!  =
As it does so, it seems to split off, and streak through closed doors and i=
nto other rooms, as if seeking out those who it feels needs its healing pow=
er.  It soon comes to the panic room, and finds Rodimus and Nightlight.  As=
 promised, the power is used only to recover the lost comrades who were eff=
ected by Hydra's tyranny, and nothing more.  The light proves harmless to s=
tructures yet shows some force against Predacons and Decepticons, as it is =
able to move enemy objects away from those it strives to aid.  

In the mea=
n time, Tucson Prime falters slightly, due to the massive amount of energy =
he expands in his plight to recover his comrades.  It was a drain on his sy=
stem, but one he was willing to suffer.  It was an act of his own heart, of=
 his compassion, of his love, and the one true power that could pretty much=
 smite all others.  He hangs onto the hope of successfully completing his m=
ission.  Night Shift now tries to back his leader up, by taking out his own=
 photon riffle, and shooting back at the enemy.

" Prime! I got your back!"=


Tucson Prime nodds, as he looks to Nightshift.

" Hopefully I've fullfill=
ed my mission successfully.  Let's keep our fingers - crossed."  

Night Sh=
ift's eyes widen with concern.

"Oh no, Prime, you're runn'n outa power. "
=

Tucson Prime falls to one knee.

"I'm all - right."

Night Shift opens a c=
om link to Kup and Lord Elder.

" Kup, Lord Elder!  Tucson Prime just used =
some sorta energy and now his levels are droppn' fast!  We're gonna need a =
real fast getaway pronto!"

Tucson Prime fights the weakness and uses his s=
trength to get back on his feet.

" Just - a little longer, and - I think I=
've - done it."

There was no doubt about it, He was pushing his own spark =
to the max.  But when it came down to everything, Tucson Prime could not ig=
nore his heart.  His suffering was well worth the results, if all went acco=
rding to plan.  His hope and compassion keep him on his feet for a moment, =
and then, he collapses.  Night Shift is quick to go by his side.

"TUCSON P=
RIME! TALK TA ME BOSS BOT, TALK TA ME!"

arkhawk hit the main control pannel and as a security measure the Fortress =

ogram could be picked up. Revealing that Darkhawk is truly Windlord

> On Sat, Apr 10, 2010 at 11:50 PM, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> =

>     
>   Location: Black Fortress.
> 
>   Nightshift, Tucson Prime, Rat =
Trap and Quickstride.
> 
>   Inside the fortress:
> 
>   Night Shift is alm=
ost caught by surprise by his own shiruken and manages to swerve around it,=
 with a screech in his tires. He was hoping to get one of the enemies to sh=
oot at him,thinking that by mistake they may just blast one of the control =
pannels that controls the fortress accidentally, thus allowing him to slip =
out. With his night vision he spots a main control pannel, and realizes tha=
t Scorponok is shooting at him with the plasma cannons, as is Scourge, who =
is content on trying to fry his carborator. He remains quiet, yet continues=
 to speed around the room, hoping that at least one of them would take the =
bait. He wasn't running scared, he was clearly up to something strategic. H=
e thinks to himself.
> 
>   " I knew you bozos were stupid enough ta buy in=
ta me. That's it, keep shootn' my way, eventually I'm gonna make a move tow=
ard one of them power boxes and then whoops, someone's gonna hit somethn' b=
y accident."
> 
>   He sends a silent com to Lord Elder.
> 
>   " Nightshif=
t reportn' in Sir. I'm fine, just gettn' the chase of a lifetime in here, n=
othn' serious. I got a few dings on the fenders but nothn' that can't be ba=
nged out with a hammer. Look, guys, I ain't found Nightlight, Rodimus or Wi=
ndlord, but I'm kinda playn' a game of catn' mouse with the baddies. Hopn' =
ta get one of them ta mess up'n hit a power box by accident, instead of hit=
tn' me... OHHHH SCRAP!"
> 
>   He screeches loudly as he avoids another clo=
se call with a plasma blast.
> 
>   "That was almost my left front tire, cl=
ose one. Anyway, I really could use a hand in here, I dunno how much longer=
 my fuel reserves are gonna hold out. I'm at about a half a tank now, and t=
he way I'm gon' here, that ain't gonna take long ta go through... Gotta bur=
n rubber, talk later, Nightshift out."
> 
>   Outside the fortress, Tucson =
Prime comes out of his trance. He holds his chest for just a moment.
> 
>  =
 "Sorry guys, I didn't mean to frighten you. I just got quite the wakeup ca=
ll. We need to get into that fortress but first we need to short out the co=
ntrol pannel that keeps it beneath that magma pool."
> 
>   Rat Trap shrugs=
. 
> 
>   "Lord Elder did mention somethn' about blastn' inta the pool, but=
 we ain't got that kinda fire power on us."
> 
>   Tuscon grins confidently=
.
> 
>   "That's all right, I do. Stand back, the first step to bringing li=
ght to a black flame, is to create a backdraft. On second thought, I better=
 do this in vehicle mode. I can assure your saftey better than being in rob=
ot mode."
> 
>   He transforms into his missile truck mode, and opens his d=
oors to his cab.
> 
>   "Lord Elder, I'm back, just needed to consult someo=
ne as to my next move. It's my first day on the job as a Prime and I needed=
 a little inside advice. And I got it. Kup, I also read you, and I'm going =
to expidite this mission a bit. It's dragged on far too long. Time for acti=
on not beating around the rotary."
> 
>   He lines himself up for the shot =
and aims both missile carriers at the pool, targeting not in the center of =
the pool, but a slight before getting to the middle of the magma chamber. R=
at Trap and Quickstride buckle in, to anticipate the major kick back Tucson=
's missile launchers may have. Then, Tucson fires, as they kick back, causi=
ng him to lurch backward slightly as he gets used to firing them at the sam=
e time.
> 
>   "Ughh, felt that.. Are you two okay?"
> 
>   Rat Trap is now=
 on top of Quickstride, who is now looking to the control pannel.
> 
>   "U=
mm, we're - okay.. Just a little - bit shell shocked. Wowwww... Talk about =
kick back... It wasn't like ya didn't warn us because ya did but we weren't=
 expecting that..."
> 
>   Rat Trap rubs his head.
> 
>   "Yeah, talk about=
 the big bang theory."
> 
>   Tucson rolls forward just a slight.
> 
>   " =
It even kicked me back a few feet. I have to learn to ground my tires when =
I use those missiles. Sorry about that."
> 
>   Rat Trap gets back into his=
 seat and buckles up.
> 
>   "So, how are we gonna get through this?
> 
>  =
 Tucson parks himself safely waiting for the results of his launch.
> 
>   =
" We're going to relight the dark flame. I have the power within me, the po=
wer of the Matrix. The dark flame, represents Rodimus, who's armor is black=
 as pitch and flaming paint job dimmed to a drap pale color. That's the fir=
e I need to rekindle."
> 
>   Rat Trap gasps as does Quickstride.
> 
>   "B=
ut Wheels, that might that might do a number on ya."
> 
>   Tuscon sighs.
>=
 
>   " I know Rat Trap, it will. I'll still be a Prime no matter what happ=
ens, but if all goes well, we will get Rodimus back and Cyclonus will pay f=
or his deeds against Primus. It's worth the risk my friends, it's worth the=
 risk."
> 
>   Rat Trap sheds a tear.
> 
>   "But but what if it kills ya? =
What's Talon gonna do without ya? What am I gonna do without ya? Wheels, yo=
u're the only real friend I ever did have. I don't wanna lose ya."
> 
>   T=
ucson could feel a tear drip on his dashboard. 
> 
>   " I promise you Rat =
Trap, neither Talon or you is going to lose me that easilly. I may be out o=
f commission for a few days, but it's not going to kill me. Remember when w=
e talked about the most powerful force in the universe? How nothing could e=
ver surpass that?"
> 
>   Rat Trap nodds.
> 
>   " I think so. Ya told me t=
hat love is a force no one can reckon with. Nothing breaks the bond of frie=
ndship no matter how powerful evil becomes. Love knows no boundaries and is=
 the only infinite force that keeps on living even when one has passed on l=
ong ago."
> 
>   Tucson gently straps Rat Trap in more securely.
> 
>   "Th=
at's right Rat Trap. Remember that. It's our bond as friends that can never=
 be broken. All of us, including Talon, Elita, Kup, Lord Elder, Depthcharge=
, Lord Perseus, Legacy, Guardia, and Ravenchief have the power within ourse=
lves not because of tyranical strength, but because of that one thing that =
neither Hydras, Megatron or Galvatron ever had. And that was True Love. The=
y rule with force, not with compassion. Our heart is what is going to win u=
s this battle, our hearts are going to come together as one and we will sav=
e those that need to be saved, and rekindle the lights that have nearly bee=
n blown out."
> 
>   He starts up his engines.
> 
>   " NOW, LET'S DO THIS!=
 FOR RODIMUS PRIME!"
> 
>   Rat Trap and Quickstride join in.
> 
>   "FOR R=
ODIMUS PRIME, LEADER OF THE AUTOBOTS!"
> 
>   Tucson fires several more rou=
nds into the magma.
>
